00030 enum TPVThreadContext
00031 {
00032     EPVThreadContext_InThread //context is in-thread
00033     , EPVThreadContext_OsclThread //some other thread that has Oscl initialized
00034     , EPVThreadContext_NonOsclThread //some thread that does not have Oscl initialized
00035     , EPVThreadContext_Undetermined
00036 };
